bibl.title: Eraclito e i Persiani nel papiro di Derveni (col. IV 10-14).

series.title: Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts.

bibl.title: Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé.

bibl.seg: Ferrari Franco, Eraclito e i Persiani nel papiro di Derveni (col. IV 10-14).

Miguel Herrero de Jáuregui, Ana I. Jiménez San Cristóbal, Eugenio R. Luján, Raquel Martín Hernández, Marco A. Santamaría, Sofía Torallas Tovar (Eds.), Tracing Orpheus: Studies of Orphic Fragments In Honour of Alberto Bernabé = Sozomena. Studies in the Recovery of Ancient Texts. 10 (Berlin - New York, 2011) pp. 365-370, 1 fig.
